title: CMS, Data and Logic binding in properties view
description: Our editor provides a way to bind a CMS, Data or Logic but it just works for some attributes. The developers would need to bind more attributes. Smart button in property view might be a powerful feature for them to do that.

featureset.title: Phase 1
featureset.description: Add button into properties view line

featureset.title: Phase 2
featureset.description: Trigger action to open the binding CMS UI

featureset.title: Phase 3
featureset.description: Apply changes into the SE and GE
